title: ICE: cfi with async: `transform_ty: unexpected GeneratorWitness(Binder..`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code `rustc treereduce.out --edition=2021 -Zsanitizer=cfi -Zsanitizer-cfi-normalize-integers -Clto` ```Rust use std::future::Future; async fn data_moved_async() {} fn run_fut(fut: impl Future) -> T { loop {} } fn main() { run_fut(data_moved_async()); } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.71.0-nightly (6f8c0557e 2023-05-04) binary: rustc commit-hash: 6f8c0557e0b73c73a8a7163a15f4a5a3feca7d5c commit-date: 2023-05-04 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.71.0-nightly LLVM version: 16.0.2 ``` ### Error output ``` ```
Backtrace

``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_symbol_mangling/src/typeid/typeid_itanium_cxx_abi.rs:881:13: transform_ty: unexpected `GeneratorWitness(Binder([], []))` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/6f8c0557e0b73c73a8a7163a15f4a5a3feca7d5c/compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1643:9 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f9d9d369441 -
